name: That Titanium Guy
description: The federal army is trying to take away your family’s land! Defend your rights by marching a bloody path to the capital hills! Use a variety of ranged and melee weapons in your arsenal to destroy your enemies. Upgrade and change your weapon configurations in whatever way you like; like the saying goes, there’s more than one way to skin a baddie. Challenge yourself by beating the levels in the least amount of time with the most enemy kills and the least damage taken!
